website_summaries.verdict: An excellent economy choice that gets the job done and keeps laptops protected.
pros: Sizing options let you get a tight fit while the slim fit still leaves room to fit in a backpack or briefcase
cons: A few reports of a problem with the zipper

customer_reviews.title: Left color on my laptop and my hand
customer_reviews.text: I got my laptop sleeve for my new macbook today. I was excited toopen it and get my laptop inside of it. When I pulled my laptop out, it left a purple color on my MacBook and my hands. I also noticed the internal tag was stained a light redish color. I'm wondering if this is really new or if it had gotten wet in transit? Not satisfied with the current product.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Caplinger

customer_reviews.title: Purple dye transfered to hands and laptop be careful
customer_reviews.text: Prepare to dye your laptop and hands indigo purple. I spent over an hour alcohol wiping the brand new laptop we gifted my mother and there's still a mark across the top of her computer from this product. This is a piece of junk. I will go to a brandname item to avoid dying other items purple. Shame on you, Amazon, for not testing your product quality better.
customer_reviews.author: Christine E Shander

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, But the Color Ran
customer_reviews.text: This arrived, and it is the most gorgeous shade of purple. Unfortunately, the color stained my new white Chromebook. I didn't return it, as I was traveling. I suppose it wouldn't be a problem with a dark laptop.
customer_reviews.author: La Parisienne

customer_reviews.title: Works with NEW MacBook Pro w/Touchbar (2016)
customer_reviews.text: The 14-inch sleeve is a perfect fit for the new MacBook Pro 15 w/Touchbar (Late 2016). I was looking for a neoprene sleeve that would fit snug around the now smaller in size 15-inch MacBook Pro. This is the solution. Fits like it was made for it, no slop side-to-side or top-to-bottom. It is a good quality case with a well constructed body, decent padding on the sides and a excellent zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Z.

customer_reviews.title: Get the 14" for the new 15" MacBook Pro!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially made the mistake of buying the 15 inch sleeve for my 15 inch MacBook Pro (w/ Touch Bar) and the sleeve was WAY too big. After passing it on to someone else and buying myself the 14 inch sleeve, I'm super happy with it! The fit is a little snug around the corners, which leads me to believe that the corners could wear out quicker than the rest of the sleeve, but it's been great for keeping my laptop safe when I put it in a purse or am just toting it around. Fantastic product for the price and I'll probably buy a backup just to have on hand. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lrmanders

customer_reviews.title: Fits iPad Pro 12.9” (2018) perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect for the iPad Pro 12.9”. I took a chance considering the internal size specs claimed 8” x 11” (which is almost the exact size of the iPad Pro 12.9 2018)....Andy it fits perfectly. It even fits well with Apple Pencil connected. I can’t speak to fit with a TPU case but will update this review once I try that.
customer_reviews.author: techie1982

customer_reviews.title: Zippers are cheap and break quickly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's chromebook. He's gone through two of these this school year because the zippers are junk and don't last. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Boxerkate

customer_reviews.title: 15 inch FAR too big. for Macbook pro 2015 15 inch Retina.
customer_reviews.text: This is incorrectly advertised as having the option to buy EITHER a 15 inch size OR a 15.6. I believe they are the same thing. I bought the one labelled '15 inch' and it is way too big for the 2015 macbook pro 15 inch with Retina display. But the next size down (14) shows measurements that are too small. I have read that the 14 fits the NEW macbooks as they are smaller, but why is noone making one to the fit the previous model?? its not that old... I've bought so many of these now to no avail
customer_reviews.author: Stacey MI

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better description
customer_reviews.text: The problem isn't with the sleeve, it's with the description. Sleeve is very well made and nicely padded. I really like it. Problem is it won't fit a 10" tablet unless that tablet is square, i.e. Samsung or Apple. A lot of 10' tablets are widescreen. Guess which kind I have. So this sleeve is about ~1" too short for my tablet. Top to bottom is perfect, but side to side, misses by an inch. The story of my life, always an inch too short. But other than that, a great product. I'll use it for something
customer_reviews.author: T. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, lightweight soft case for 12" chhromebook
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a travel bag for my chromebook. And until I could find one purchased this case to protect my Chromebook. It fits perfectly and has proven to be just the right accessory. I can't speak to the water resistance, as I always avoid the possibilyt of any water near my electronic devices. Now that I have found a travel bag for my Chromebook I just tuck this case into the larger opening for even more protection. And when I'm not traveling but want to protect my device I can easily pull this case out if I have to carry it around the house or other short distaances.
customer_reviews.author: lewbrika

customer_reviews.title: This sleeve will fit comfortably in my laptop bag and is safe to carry ...
customer_reviews.text: lives up to everything that is listed on the product page. After examining and using the sleeve, I discovered the build quality and cosmetic appeal is exceptional. I use the sleeve for my 12.9 iPad pro device. This sleeve will fit comfortably in my laptop bag and is safe to carry as a stand-alone protective sleeve due to the generous padding. Amazon offers this sleeve in other colors however the black is my favorite. I have had this sleeve for almost 1 year and have washed it a few times without any damage. The packaging is well suited for the sleeve, everything you need, nothing you don't. I have purchased other AmazonBasic products and have been completely satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best budget sleeve out there.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a Macbook Air 13" inch 2011 model, and I needed something to protect this expensive piece of tech. I was looking on amazon for a computer that was flexible, but sturdy enough, had a nice color to it, and would fit my computer like a glove. I had to go to amazon basics for the sleeve. This was a affordable puzzle piece to my computer to make sure it protects scratches and other damages. I'm happy to say this was worth the price. It fit with no struggle. Has a nice texture to it, and most importantly, protects my computer Shipping was 2 days (with prime) [...]. Thanks for your time.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Blumkin

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a 15.6 laptop
customer_reviews.text: The item is too large and not accurately made for a 15.6in laptop. Could possibly fit an 18in screen. The picture above shows my laptop in the case - I tried to make the excess room apparent. The dimensions listed for the item differed in two spots in the item description section so I took a gamble. The correct dimensions are 16.2 L x 12W. Not sure it's worth it to fight to justify a return... But not happy with the buy
customer_reviews.author: holly195

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Kindle Paperwhite
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Kindle Paperwhite and I really enjoy it. It's a bit of a loose fit because the Kindle Paperwhite is a little bit smaller than 7 inches but I still feel like my Kindle is protected fine. I'm a college student so I wanted something durable that would keep my Kindle safe in my backpack or purse. It's well made and definitely worth the low price. I'd recommend it to anyone with a Kindle Paperwhite who wants to keep their tablet safe.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: My Computer Fit Nicely For Travel
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at this bag for a minute and had decided that I finally needed a carrier since I am in school and I always just carry my computer in my book bag but I make sure I carry like a heavy duty book bag to make sure that my computer is save. So I finally decided to finally order a case travel for my computer is it’s very durable I ordered the purple one it’s roomy I can add a notebook in here a couple of pens really nice I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Khyla

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory case, but beware of dye issues
customer_reviews.text: Fits myjust fine, but some sort of excess dye bled off the rubberized zipper tab onto my completely dry fingers, which then transferred over to my Chromebook. Luckily I noticed it in time to clean it off without issue, but was still worrying regardless. I know you get what you pay for, but I expect a certain minimum of quality from Amazon's own products.
customer_reviews.author: Greg LeClair

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these after seeing a co-worker get their entire laptop backpack soaked. I also started carrying two laptops and wanted the added protection to each one. I've got two 15.6" laptops that fit great in the cases and seem to be protected extremely well. Also, adding this layer of protection has not prevented me from putting either in my Osprey native laptop sleeve inside the pack. Very inexpensive addition that offers great piece of mind with extraordinary protection against the elements and other damage. This is an honest review from someone who purchased the product.
customer_reviews.author: TechMan

customer_reviews.title: Not a perfect fit for C330
customer_reviews.text: I have a Lenovo C330 chromebook 11.6. This is one tight fit. I had to stretch it out a bit, and even now, the zipper contacts the computer when zipping closed. Some reviewer noted this causes scratches to his laptop, so that makes me a bit concerned. For now I'm just gonna keep an eye on it. I expect as it breaks in that it will loosen up a little. Only time will tell. Update: after 9 months of use, the sleeve fits a lot better now. It does take some real breaking in to make it fit.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Holder for the XP-Pen Artist 15.6 Pro
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my XP-Pen Artist 15.6 Pro Pen Display. It's at the width limits of the case since the tablet measures 17.4". The Material is stretchy enough that I was able to fit the Cables, Pen & Tablet stand in the case. The zipper didn't hang up at all when closing, so there's not fear of it failing in the near future. The Stitching looked descent. No loose strings, and everything seemed snug. The inside of the case seems like it's soft enough that it won't scratch my matte screen on the pen display. I may put in a microfiber cloth that'll cover the screen just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Stas T. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Size did not fit.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this sleeve as suggested item when I purchased the Lenovo Chromebook (C330 2-in-1 Convertible Laptop, 11.6-Inch HD (1366 x 768) IPS Display, MediaTek MT8173C Processor, 4GB LPDDR3, 64 GB eMMC, Chrome OS, 81HY0000US, Blizzard White), however it did not fit. The sleeve is nice, but the Chromebook was larger than the sleeve (hence 1 star rating for improper fit). Chromebook product dimensions: 11.5 x 0.8 x 8.5 inches (Item Dimensions L x W x H - 11.5 x 0.77 x 8.48 inches). Thanks for refund Amazon, 5-star rating on service & response!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but the small is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Great color. Not nearly as magenta as depicted, but I'm looking for cooler colored purples so it works. Very sturdy and resilient. The smell, however, is horrendous. It has really strong plastic fumes that don't seem to want to dissipate. It takes up residence in your nose hairs and sticks fast an unmoving, like a squatter trying to claim homestead rights. Hopefully the smell leaves before I have to evict the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Darius Sayers

customer_reviews.title: If you have a thin laptop, beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for a Lenovo 720S 15IKB. This is a standard 15.6" laptop. I had wanted a laptop sleeve that fit snugly around my laptop and did not allow it move around in the sleeve, which may cause unnecessary scratches. The laptop that I have is a relatively thin laptop which may be the reason by the sleeve itself seems a few inches too big. It accomplishes what I need it to on a basic level, but perhaps they should have a version of this for thinner laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Dell XPS 13 2020
customer_reviews.text: 11.6" works great for my new Dell XPS 13 2020. Fits like a glove. Decent padding. Nice to put on lap to keep warm laptop from overheating legs. I first bought a fancier sleeve (Lacdo 11 Inch Laptop Sleeve Chromebook Case for MacBook Air 11.6) with pockets but found it to be way too thick, completely negating the small size of the laptop for travelling.
customer_reviews.author: Baughman

customer_reviews.title: Very tight squeeze for a MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, but it does not accommodate a 13.3-inch 2016 MacBook Air very well, contrary to some of the other reviews. The laptop slides in nicely, but getting the zipper to close requires pushing and pulling around the corners of the laptop to a degree that makes me wonder whether, long term, it's going to scratch the laptop. (And no, I haven't enclosed the laptop in a plastic case.) I've decided, somewhat optimistically, to keep it and see whether the material will stretch out enough—or the inside padding will compress enough—over time to make this a workable sleeve. BTW, the blue color is darker than shown on the website—it's actually sort of a royal blue—but that's okay with me.
customer_reviews.author: B Howell

customer_reviews.title: Simple and reasonably protective laptop sleeve...
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up as an accessory gift for my mother's new laptop. She needed a simple case to protect her laptop during minor transport use as well as moving to different rooms around the house and this was an effective and cost efficient solution. The case sleeve contains her laptop well and provides some protective cushion when moving her device. When she has the laptop in use, the cushion can act as a makeshift mouse pad unless she uses a preferred one with her wireless mouse. It's a pretty simplistic and functional sleeve for daily use and works well for my mother that doesn't travel often or tends to move her electronic devices from room to room as much.
customer_reviews.author: MarilynTop Contributor: Firefly (TV Show)

customer_reviews.title: Took off stars b/c too early to rate
customer_reviews.text: FYI, this purchase hasn't left my home due to the pandemic, therefore I can't accurately rate the durability, water resistance or how it holds up during traveling. I can honestly say that it took a while to arrive even with Prime, which I expected because it's not an essential item. I work from home, so I bought it to protect my laptop for off work hours. It definitely will protect my laptop if it fell while in it & seems like it would protect my laptop from spillage. The zipper worked. The item is as described.
customer_reviews.author: BornWithStyle

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and durable cover. It absolutely fits my 15 inch laptop with some room to spare. The people complaining that this sleeve isn't big enough either didn't measure their laptop or are expecting it to fit their chargers as well as the laptop. In fact, I put this sleeve inside my huge Vera bradley tote. It fits well and looks nice. The material is squishy so it protects the laptop from getting knocked around in the bag. Not that you can easily find a bag that would fit something this big :) but the Vera Bradley (I think I have a Vera) does the trick. Love the laptop sleeve
customer_reviews.author: Gertrude

customer_reviews.title: Be appraised that this sleeve measures a bit under 10" ...
customer_reviews.text: Be appraised that this sleeve measures a bit under 10" outside length, but only 9 1/2" inside length. The 9.7" ipad (diagonal screen measure but not length) will fit but tight (I tried it), and surely won't fit if the ipad has a protective case on it (I tried it), and if you have one on you might consider the 11 1/2" sleeve. The ipad does fit the height dimension of the sleeve however, even with a protective case on it. For amazon fire tablet 10.1" diagonal, you need to measure the length of the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Nomdeplume

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, soft sleek case.
customer_reviews.text: I really loblve this case, soft, sleek and protective, plus explandable enough to allow little objects to be added to the case as well like a stylus. I only wish it had a handle and maybe a pocket on the inside for pens and styluses and then it would have gotten all 5 stars. It definitely is water proof. I had a leak in my apartment, the laptop was in the case right in the area and it was not water damaged so i was very happy about that. I don't regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: shivymay

customer_reviews.title: Like the blue color, good for price
customer_reviews.text: I dropped some water on it to test water resistance. Water beaded up but surface held some dampness so I assume it provides some water resistance but isn't exactly waterproof. Blue color is nice. Interior is sort of brushed or felt like so soft for cradling laptop. Zipper opens and closes easily on the one I received and looks like good quality. Neoprene type fabric. My 17.3 laptop fits so overall while it might not have the most bells and whistles as a simple cover to pad my laptop to help protect it I'm satisfied and it was reasonably priced so I have to give it 5 stars for value.
customer_reviews.author: CrystalTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Basics Products Rock!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return this product because it was too small for my 8in Lenovo Yoga Tab 3. But regardless of the fit issue it is another great product. The zipper was sturdy, the neoprene and stitching was high quality, overall very well constructed. I will be ordering another larger case from Amazon Basics. Amazon Basics products are awesome! Simple, no frills packaging, low prices, and a wide range of quality products, would definitely recommend anything they sell :)
customer_reviews.author: jenniferrb517

customer_reviews.title: Slim, lightweight, durable, great for a backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Got mine for an Asus Zenbook 13.3 and it fits with a good amount of extra room. I can still fit my mouse/charger and cables in the bag. A Heavier and bigger than the original, but more protection and extra room. Some details are wrong. The weight is actually 5.7oz (163g). Interior is 12 3/8 x 9 inches. No issues with the color rubbing off, but I got the black one. Will be carrying this while I travel through Asia for the next year, will update on the durability.
customer_reviews.author: VirtualLife

customer_reviews.title: Good basic protection, perfect fit for a 17.3" laptop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold my laptop and a messenger bag to store the peripherals and extras. I have a Dell Inspiron with a 17"3 screen. My laptop measures 16.5" x 11", and the sleeve holds it perfectly, not too snug and not too loose. It's padded well, but obviously not meant for heavy-duty use (which is generally not the purpose of sleeves anyway). Offers good light-duty protection. I'll be buying another one for my 14" laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8' kindle fire for when i travel. Even though my kindle is fairly durable, its nice to have some sort of protection when I throw it in my bag. The case has a nice soft inner coating to protect from scratching the display and some ok plush to absorb some impact. The interior has enough room where it isn't a super tight fit nor is it too empty where my device flops around. There's enough space to store my passport, paper documents and currency. Overall, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Nice amount of padding
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Asus Chromebook which is 11 inches. It is a snug fit (diagonally), a little too snug for my preference, but it works great. I have been traveling with it for a few months - planes and bus rides. I give it a 4 star for durability because I haven't "tested" how it handles under very rough conditions. I like to use a mouse over the touch pad and I am also able to easily fit a small mouse pad behind the Chromebook inside the sleeve. This helps prevent the mouse pad from bending and the underside cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Darin O

customer_reviews.title: 11.6 Inch Sleeve Protects my Tablet
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to protect my Microsoft Surface 2 with a folio case and Type keyboard while in my bag for traveling. The Surface fits perfectly in this sleeve with all accessories attached. I cannot vouch for the water resistance because I have not encountered a situation where that would be tested. I would say that with everything inside the sleeve, there is still a little wiggle room inside. This is not a deal-breaker as it does what it's intended for. Not too bad for the price. There was no smell like some of the comments, and yes, though it was slightly too big, it does the job for protecting my tablet in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: M1beowulf

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Size that arrived was smaller than size labeled on box and smaller than listed on the site description.
customer_reviews.author: wonderandwander

customer_reviews.title: Get it without any hesitation!
customer_reviews.text: Just right! Basic, simple design made with a material (neoprene?) that offers the right amount of padding and protection (from both accidental bumps and dust) for your expensive investment. It fits my 17.3" in. Envy HP Lap top perfectly well with a small space to spare too. The zipper opening feels sturdy; it easily and smoothly zips close or unzips open. I'm very glad I purchased this affordable sleeve, which also comes in smaller sizes to fit your 15" or even smaller lap tops. As for travel, I would readily carry my expensive lap top in this sleeve inside a carry on for both air or land travel. It is definitely worth it, get it without any hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: Soft, durable, & protective
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this laptop sleeve for nearly 2 years now, and it still looks/performs like it was brand new. The material is soft (also works well as a mouse pad in a pinch), durable (no visible damage to mine over roughly 2 years of use), and protective (no damage to my laptop whatsoever). I've used this case for carrying my laptop back and forth to/from campus in my backpack, during travel in planes/luggage, and for protective storage at home, all without any issues. I am thoroughly satisfied with this laptop sleeve and highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Purchased For Small Business
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a ten pack of the 13.3 inch laptop sleeves so I could have one for everyone in my office. Everyone was pleased with the initial quality and the black caters to everyone's tastes. They have been in use for a few weeks now including heavy usage by the sales team who frequently travel. I have not received any complaints on the quality and durability of the product. Mine still works great and I don't see any rips/tears. Arguably the most important part is that the zipper appears to be of good quality (usually this is the first thing to break on these).
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Not a perfect fit for the 2018 13" Air
customer_reviews.text: The tagline for this affordable laptop sleeve said it works for the 2018 Air, and technically it does... but it gaps by about an inch lengthwise and half an inch widthwise. I think it was tailored for an earlier model and now just billed for the new Air until they actually come up with a new design. It's not a huge deal, but I don't like the way my new laptop shimmies inside the sleeve... makes it feel less compact and secure than when I know the sleeve is holding it tight on all sides. Plus the extra material somewhat defeats the purpose of the smaller Air for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gervasio

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR TRAVEL & ACTIVE LIFE
customer_reviews.text: Your electronics are nicely padded and this is an important safeguard against shocks and scratches. I am always putting devices into briefcases and luggage. You NEED padded slip-on cases to protect devices/laptops so this is a good looking and real solution. It's okay to put your devices into nice leather holders (and I do) and that's fine when you're carrying them into meetings but when it comes to TRAVEL, having a PADDED case is VITAL. This case is ideal as you get PADDING without using up too much space. Then you can put them into luggage or carry-ons without worry. In a word it's PRACTICAL.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Dewolf

customer_reviews.title: Basic but great
customer_reviews.text: Bought almost a year ago. Not one issue. I wouldn't say it's rugged but it is well built and runs smooth and fast. Has been used almost every day for at least 3 or 4 hours a day by adult and a 7 year old for web search, youtube, music, gmail, some netflix/prime movies, and some basic google docs. If that's basically what you need a 200 dollar machine for, then this thing is pretty great. If the keyboard was lit or even if it had bright white lettering i would have given it 5 stars. As is, easy 4.5 stars. Money well spent for basic use.
customer_reviews.author: Doubles

customer_reviews.title: Almost...
customer_reviews.text: So, the dimensions are a little askew (or they were with mine anyway). This definitely allows for a 15.6" laptop, but there's so much play that the laptop slides around inside the case. It was so bad that I kept the foam packing insert because if I didn't, it was too much slack The material was way thinner and flimsier than I expected despite my complete understanding that it was an Amazon Basics product and therefore intended to be more of a budget solution rather than high-quality. Still, though, I wouldn't say I'm exactly satisfied but it's too much trouble returning it so I'll keep it and probably replace it with something better later.
customer_reviews.author: CtryBy

customer_reviews.title: Fits our Acer Predator 15.6" gaming laptops perfect. Serves well.
customer_reviews.text: Love this sleeve. It's not a ton of padding, but it's not really meant to be. It's to protect from basic scratches and light bumps. I have two of these, both for me and my wife's Acer Predator 15.6" gaming laptops. The laptops do not fit in standard 15.6" sleeves as they are oversized, but they fit perfectly in the 17.3". I keep them in the sleeve and also use a big laptop bag that fits 18" laptops and the sleeve fits in it as well, giving it extra protection. I would recommend these for any laptop that will fit for the extra protection.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for laptops and cats
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for laptops and also for cats. My cat has claimed this laptop sleeve and sleeps on it every night. I show her the sleeve and she comes running to curl up for bedtime. Because of this, I had to buy a new laptop sleeve that remains cat hair free and gave her this one. Some days I question who the alpha female really is in our household...
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D

customer_reviews.title: Great basic laptop sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I really like the AmazonBasics laptop sleeve. I have a 13" MacBook Pro and use it for traveling to work and back home. It gives just the right amount of protection to make me feel secure in knowing if I should happen to drop the sleeve, the MacBook Pro will be somewhat protected. Granted the sleeve provides just basic protection and nothing like a actual laptop bag, but it's great for when I'm walking from the parking garage to my work building.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Black

customer_reviews.title: I love it when something works out
customer_reviews.text: Without having something custom-made, I don't know how I could have found a better case for my new Pixelbook. It slides in easily with just enough room to spare on the sides. The depth is more than needed for just the Pixelbook, but not enough to be a problem to use for it alone. I'm actually happy it has enough room to include the Pixelbook Pen, a Kindle Paperwhite, and a Walkman. All loaded up, it does have a lumpy profile, but it will keep my most-used electronics safe, organized, and accessible especially for travel. Note, the white cat hair in the photos was not included with the product but added by our Dory.
customer_reviews.author: D. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Great every day sleeve- limited protection
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sleeve for students or anyone on the go. I’ve been using mine every day for just over a year and it’s in perfect condition to keep in my purse. It’s not super protective if you’re prone to dropping etc and I absolutely would not trust it in the event of a spill, but for grabbing your computer on the go, it’s perfect for keeping in a large purse. It’s not the most professional looking because of the material, so just unzip in your purse and take out directly in meetings or formal settings.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Basic and functional
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this to protect his Chromebook he received from his school. He travels to school with it in this and in his backpack. It works well. If I could do it again, I might order it with a spare inch of room all around. It is a tight fit but my son likes it and thinks it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: baseball mom

customer_reviews.title: Great construction, good value
customer_reviews.text: Great construction, good value. But, pay attention to the listed internal dimensions. The 10" sleeve is not big enough for my 10" Lenovo TAB-X103F tablet. Technically, it will sqeeze into the sleeve, but the tension on the top of the tablet will turn the tablet on accidentally. Otherwise, great value with good stitching. The neoprene sleeve protects a little from drops, but mainly from people moving my tablet around the house when I am not there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protective case for Dell XPS 13
customer_reviews.text: I used this case with my XPS 13 and as other reviewers have pointed out, it is a nice fit. I could see MacBooks fitting in well too. Nice soft, plush padding around the entire inside and outside of the case. This could easily accommodate a charger slid in along one side if you didn't have anywhere else to put it. I have used this inside backpacks, standalone, and even just to hid my expensive laptop out of sight from traveling eyes. For these purposes, this performs great. Amazon Basics really has some great products. I expect this sleeve case to last me for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit MacBook Pro 15in. 2018 model
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a MacBook Pro 15 inch 2018 model. I had to return it as it was way too big for the laptop, with the laptop sliding around inside the sleeve. I would recommend you spend the extra money and get the Incase laptop sleeve that is designed for the slimmer MacBook Pro. It’s worth the extra cost for a sleeve that fits and protects.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki RB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderflul sleeve but a little too tight for my Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, basic neoprene sleeve but its a little tight for my Lenovo 100e Chromebook. I am afraid the zippers will put apart as they just barely make it over the corners of that Chromebook. I'm sending it back for that reason but otherwise it's a terrific sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Church

customer_reviews.title: Oversized
customer_reviews.text: The sleeve seems sized to fit a 17ish inch laptop. It creates a lot of extra real estate for the 15 inch computer to move around in, which I really don't like. In my case, it doesn't fit in my backpack because of that. The interior isn't as smooth as I would like. I don't think it would scratch, but still not the best. I also don't see this as being water resistant at all. I haven't had the unfortunate need to know yet though. Seems well put together as a whole just not the highest quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I just received the package. I unzipped the sleeve, it got stuck in the middle. I slowly unzipped it completely. Now when I trying to zip it again, The slider is going till the end but the teeth are open, now it is completely useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 11,904 AmazonBasics Sleeve Reviews: So why even look at mine??
customer_reviews.text: I realize most of you tech gladiators will never even glance at this message of friendship from afar. Here’s a comparison other 13” cases I’ve used in case this is of some small help IS THE AMAZONBASICS SLEEVE CASE BUILT FOR THE LONG HAUL? In a word, yes. These neoprene style cases are a great combo of lightweight and durable HOW DOES THE MACBOOK FIT? Like a glove. IS THE ZIPPER GOING TO WONK OUT ON ME? We have two and think they are as good as the “name brand.” Smooth zipper. No issue. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for value so far!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this at Christmas so I haven’t tested the water proofing or durability quite yet, but the traveling protection has been 100% so far! This is a seemingly great little case for the price and it also still fits well with a hard case attached to the computer! When the durability & waterproofing are ever tested & work as well as the traveling protection works so far - it’s a definite 5 star across the board!
customer_reviews.author: LRP

customer_reviews.title: Great for a traveler who must have my fire7 at the ready
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I actually prefer a simple sleeve but the ones I have ordered in the past (and given as I gift kidlefire7) are no longer available so I ordered this. Perfect fit, and even though I just wanted a basic sleeve without a zipper this gives me the option of tossing headphones and a small powerbank, cord or a small book. Perfect for a consimant traveler (me). Zipper is plasticy. Not in a cheep way but in that it does not scratch my screen when I toss my fire7 in at a moment's notice. Will by again as the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Chromebook!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect product for my son's Chromebook for traveling to and from school in a backpack. Time will tell how well it holds up at the end of the school year (we ARE actually in school, not just virtual) but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi in VA

customer_reviews.title: Going Strong After 5+ Years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop sleeve in 2014 for my MacBook Air and now use it with my MacBook Pro. This sleeve has gone to college with me, studied abroad with me, and has gone other places in the world with me. It still looks brand new several years later (pictures to come) and has never had any rips, tears, or zipper issues. I have purchased this exact case as a gift and recommend it to others because it has proved itself over the years. A+ AmazonBasics!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: A great, affordable, and high quality laptop bag! Fits my 2018 15” MacBook Pro easily, even with a case on it! Fits nice and snug so it’s not moving around inside, but not too snug where it’s hard to put it in or take it out. Great for a student like me who doesn’t have a laptop compartment in my bags, so it keeps my new (and expensive) computer protected when on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These neoprene sleeves are great!
customer_reviews.text: Review of - AmazonBasics 10-Inch Tablet Sleeve - These neoprene sleeves are great! The neoprene is very thick and substantial. The zipper is heavy duty. The pull tab on the zipper is heavy duty, square, apparently rubber clad aluminum, and first rate. - Keep in mind that these sleeves can be used for items other than computer tablets. They are very versatile. - The only way amazon could make this product better would be to give up putting their logo on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks to it
customer_reviews.text: It does the job of holding my kindle and maybe a pen or something else. But everything else sticks to the outside: my hair, cat hair, fuzzies from a sweater. The color I have is black, so this stuff is super visible. Many times I am embarrassed to take it out of my bag.
customer_reviews.author: UserE

customer_reviews.title: Saying this fits a 2018 MacBook Air 13 is misleading -  So does a garbage bag...
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a snug, protective fit for my new 2018 MacBook Air 13 laptop. The search will continue. The materials and zipper seem fine, but the fit is very sloppy. 1.5" too deep and .75" too wide for a snug, non-sloppy fit. This is a temporary (at best) $10 solution for a potentially much more expensive problem. This should not be advertised as a good fit for a 2018 13" MacBook Air anymore than a garbage bag is a good fit. Of course it fits in side it. I bet 3 MacBooks would fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bandler

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but really close fit for me
customer_reviews.text: The sleeve showed up on time and in good condition. I knew that the fit on my laptop was going to be snug, but it was even closer than I expected. The curve of the corners on the sleeve means that I have to carefully slip the sleeve over the squared off corners of my laptop. I have a Dell E7450. The published dimensions of the laptop (h, w & d) said that the laptop would fit in the published interior dimensions of the sleeve. The fit at the corners came as a surprise. The sleeve seems well made and I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AZJP

customer_reviews.title: Nice, plain sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a plain laptop sleeve and wasn't impressed by products in stores, mostly due to the pattern/design. So I checked Amazon and found this simple sleeve with basic colors for half the price of what I saw in stores. This is the first Amazon Basics product I have purchased and it has not disappointed. The cushioning is much heartier than a laptop sleeve I used several years ago. There have been no issues with the zipper and I trust it to protect my laptop in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: obiwan kenobi

customer_reviews.title: Too small for 11.6 inch chrome book, zipper will scratch corners, color "bleeds" onto device
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover for my 11.6 inch chrome book. It's too small and barely fits over the chrome book if you stretch the edges of the cover as you zip it up. Also, the zipper will scratch the white finishing off the corners of the device over time as you zip and unzip. The blue fabric of the cover also "bleeds" and transfers onto parts of the white chrome book. I gave it two stars instead of one because the cover has good padding.
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: good laptop sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use with a 15" MacBook Pro with the touchbar. This case fits almost perfectly. It's not an exact fit, but it's very close. The sleeve material has some "squish" to it and feels nice to the touch. The zipper starts just over the short edge, runs up and over the long edge, and ends just over the opposite short edge. This makes it easy to get the laptop in and out. I carry the laptop+sleeve inside of another bag. There is not enough protection in the sleeve that I would feel comfortable with it as the sole source. It does protect the laptop from the contents of my other bag. Very reasonable price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good Sleeve--Just Not for Dell XPS 15
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to potentially use with the new Dell XPS 15. It's too tight of a fit. While I was able to force the zippers shut, it was obvious I would possibly be scuffing the corners from being too snug of a fit. Overall, this case is a great bargain for other standard-sized laptops; it has strong zippers, soft inner lining, and substantial padding. The Dell XPS 15 is built with unique measurements, which made this sleeve a bad fit for it; nothing to do with this sleeve, however.
customer_reviews.author: DrD

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant, simple, strong, and fluffy.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, simple, strong, and fluffy. I recommend this sleeve in the 17" size for all laptops and accessories. It is an excellent multipurpose size for interchangeable use. You may have extra material hanging off the sides, but that just means you have something to hang on to when you're swinging it around. That being said, it will protect your equipment from scratches, but not impact or heavy compression. It's just a sleeve so be prepared for that. You will have to stuff it in something sturdy if you don't want it to get bashed. With that in mind, it serves it's purpose brilliantly and I won't hesitate to grab another when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I've bought two of these so far, great product overall
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these so far so I figured I'd leave a review for the first one. I've had it nearly 3 years now and it's just a solid product. It's not armor, but it keeps my laptops relatively secure so long as I'm not throwing them around the room. I've yet to see any material degradation, just some strands of fabric that can be snipped off. They're a bit of a tight fit for some laptops that have some protrusions on the bottom of them, but the one laptop I have with this still fits in if a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepy Lion

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 15 inch MacBook like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 14 inch and it fit my new 2017 MacBook 15 inch like a glove. There is no wiggle room or space for anything else. It slides easily and offers great protection. Just exactly what I needed. Thanks to a reviewer who suggested it as the 15 inch was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Frith

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 15" MacBook pro in order to use a smaller backpack for commute instead of one with a built in laptop protector. It's significantly bigger than the laptop and there is a lot of slack on all sides. While the laptop fits in my bag without a problem, the laptop in case does not fit. It's just not laptop specific.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Still good!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon did an amazing job in creating this laptop sleeve. It is very simple and basic for my laptop needs. it does not have extra sleeves [the only downside, no room for chargers]. I thankfully have not had the incident where water spills over but based on the texture i don think it is water resistance, it would probably soak up the water. if you are prone to liquid spillage, i probably would not recommend this product. Other than that, it has lasted me 3 years with no tear, i have washed at least once [crumbs in my backpack] and it is perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Martinez

customer_reviews.title: It's a laptop sleeve.
customer_reviews.text: Got a 13.3 inch to fit a Macbook Pro. I was worried at first that it was going to be too small for the computer, but it was actually a perfectly snug fit to the device. I'm thinking the 13.3 in size works for my computer since it has rounded edges; if I had a square edged 13.3 inch PC I would consider going up to a 14 inch sleeve to make sure it zipped up easily. I am happy with the purchase overall, the sleeve has pretty good cushioning on all sides and so far seems pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Steph and Dani @ A Walk on Words

customer_reviews.title: 2 years in, still in perfect condition, use several times/week
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 2 years and just had to review this because I've dropped my macbook air many times while it was in this case and it's never cracked or broke. It's sturdy. The only thing that would make it better is a strap, but it's not a deal breaker and I would buy it again in a heart beat. But I don't have to because this lasts, I think it'll last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Freedomride

customer_reviews.title: Protects my laptop and makes it easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: As the name implies they are just basic sleeves. Not sure how much they would help if it fell on the ground but it protects the laptop from scratches and bad weather if you are not out in it for very long. I have a 11.6" laptop and it fits with room for a stylus. I got this 13.3" version because the reviews of the 11.6" one led me to believe my Dell was a little to big to fit that size. No room for the power cord and transformer so I bought a different Amazon Basics carrier for when I need to have the power cord with me.
customer_reviews.author: GaryS1964

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sleeve -- Better than the more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: My two youngest children have gone through several Case Logics sleeves similar to these. When it came time to replace them again, the Case Logics model was no longer available, but this Amazon Basics version was, so I figured I'd give it a try. I should've been buying the Amazon Basics one all along. It's much more durable (especially the zipper). I highly suspect this one will last the rest of the school year (if not longer).
customer_reviews.author: C. PilotTop Contributor: Kayaking

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is the second AmazonBasics sleeve I had bought. I've owned the first one for about 2 years and it's still holding up great. When it came to needing one for my son, I went back to the one that I knew I could depend on. Great product Amazon! I used them for MacBook Pro 13" and Chromebook. I feel they fit good and provide protection against scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Better than average but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 14" and 15.6" versions of this product for my 2018 15" MacBook Pro. The former, which I decided to keep, is just a little too small for it, and the latter is much too large. I suppose the case that barely fits is better than no case at all, but given that my machine is a fairly common one, I would have thought AmazonBasics would have a solution that would fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Amar Sheth

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile little pouch at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is another example of a quality Amazon Basics product. The pouch is an excellent size to carry electronic components (plugs, cables, etc.), small photo components, and misc items in my carry on bags. I even use it to keep those small items together that I will use at my seat on an airplane. The pouch is well padded, the zipper works well and is well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy1

customer_reviews.title: Black = cat hair magnet
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Wish it had accessory pockets, but that's a minor sacrifice for the affordable price. I kept the styrofoam inside the case. It adds extra support for my lap top. I have a 13in MacBook Pro and it fits just right. There’s a little bit of wiggle room, but not too much. UPDATE: I’ve had this case for two years. It’s still holding up strong. The zipper tab falls off, and I have to keep putting it back on. It’s kind of annoying. If I were to repurchase this, I would get it in a different color. The black over attracts a lot of cat hair.
customer_reviews.author: College Cat

customer_reviews.title: Nice, very nice.
customer_reviews.text: A really decent lightweight sleeve. Note that it only provides minor protection against scuffs, and light damage - this sleeve isn't heavy duty or padded to protect from drops, keep in mind if you want to use it to travel. I needed a cover to protect a unit for a unit that I use at home only. This fits my Lenovo Chromebook snugly. Does not fit my x220 at all, but that was to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: charlesfv

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my 11.6" HP Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect the school provided HP Chromebook we were given. It was about 1/2 inch too small making it too tight. I couldn't get it in all the way and zip it up. No way my little one would be able to do it on their own. I have a larger one for my mac and there is no problem. But the Mac is much thinner than Chromebook. Quality otherwise is great.
customer_reviews.author: EJ P.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Nexus 7 2013 perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Nexus 7 2013 perfect. Interior seems soft enough as to not scratch the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Smith

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price, thick padding
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased because my son's middle school issues every student a laptop and the parent is responsible for damages. The kids carry the laptops back and forth in a backpack. Between the bus, school and home, that backpack gets slung down onto seats and floors daily (with the laptop inside it!) This sleeve is thick enough that I feel like the laptop is protected.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Didmtbgette
customer_reviews.text: This came up as option for just bought 10 fire tablet newest edition. I guess what I just thoought that the case meant FOR A 10 inche tablet. SELLER SHOULD MAKE THIIS CLEAR OF THIS.Also thought I was getting a shatter proof screen for this so that if it falls it won't break shatter but no that did not come with this either pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lafranke72

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Basics comes through again: fair price for a decent product
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well my 14" laptop. I could've possible gone with a 13.3" size but then the cable might not have fit. Got this for a little extra protection / disquise so my computer doesn't look so much like a computer to on a table, walking down the street, etc! Small amount of protection from scratches but will not help save you in a fall ... very little padding. Good look and a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: pablo

customer_reviews.title: Has many uses
customer_reviews.text: I keep it in my glove box in my car. It has my car registration, insurance card, and owners manual. (Admit it, there are some buttons on your car you still don't know exactly what they do.) I might get one for my CD collection. I like to keep mine in the original sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Art Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for 9.7" iPad
customer_reviews.text: My iPad fits nicely in this well constructed, amply padded sleeve. Note that this is a pure sleeve; there are no pockets to organize cables or other accessories. If you want a pocket, there is a different Amazon Basics version that has one. I chose the one without a pocket because I only wanted something to provide extra protection for my iPad while it was in my laptop bag, which has ample pockets.
customer_reviews.author: J Hill

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight cushion case
customer_reviews.text: My two children (6th and 4th grade) have one day a week of remote learning this year in which they transport school owned chrome books back and forth to and from school. I bought these to protect them and prevent from unnecessary damage costs. They’re lightweight and doing a great job of protecting their computers! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jen S.

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended BUT does not fit my backpack
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to find a solution to add a little more protection to my laptop on my travels that would ideally fit nicely into my backpack. While this cover does do a nice job of covering and adding extra protection to my laptop, It cannot completely fit into my backpack and zip all the way up (as seen in photos). If the cover been a little bit more snug with less of the extra space, I believe it would be a perfect fit into my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love this product. Read my full review.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how water resistant it is. I haven’t had it around water and don’t ever plan to lol. I have an hp 14 (2019 model) laptop. Actual measurements of it is 13.25” long x 9.??” wide. It fits perfectly in this sleeve with just a little tiny bit of room left over for a mouse, earphones, and pencils. Great price for it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and useful for electronics other than tablets.
customer_reviews.text: Lost a neoprene protection sleeve for a 7” cine-Monitor. Replacement cost for this simple sleeve from the manufacturer was $30, so went looking for a less expensive alternative. These fit perfectly, have a zipper closure, and are of some of equal quality, for a fraction of the cost. Score! Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ben K

customer_reviews.title: great case
customer_reviews.text: I use this case because I keep my laptop under my dresser because I don't have much storage space in my house. I was finding that dust was getting underneath my keys. This is a perfect case. It feels nice, has some padding and is perfect for what I want. This case wouldn't protect the computer much from a fall, but it definitely would protect it from dust and getting banged up if it was in a bag with other items. I would definitely recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: amie lowery

customer_reviews.title: FITS MACBOOK PRO W/RETINA 13 INCH
customer_reviews.text: This fits the MacBook Pro w/Retina 13 inch laptop just about perfect!! There is some slight wiggle room around the edge - maybe 1/4 inch, but it's compensated with a built-in lip that prevents the laptop from getting scratched by the zipper. We also have a Speck hard case on the MacBook. So far, we are very pleased! We were worried that the computer would slide around in the sleeve or the zipper would rub against it. The quality appears to be very nice, stitching well done, zipper sturdy, Amazon logo not cheesy! Very happy we decided on this one - always very satisfied with Amazon products!
customer_reviews.author: Nuts4Bolts

customer_reviews.title: Good sleeve, nice color and texture, no fancy gimmicks or additions
customer_reviews.text: It's a neoprene sleeve, like any other you've seen in stores, or in the airport terminal waiting for your flight. It's a soft, but relatively strong material, with enough grip that it won't slip out of your hand. No pockets for any accessories or cables, or flash drives, but most sleeves don't have that anyways. No decals or designs on it making it look bad, just all black. If your laptop fits, it's not a bad option. I normally put my laptop in this, and then in my backpack for real protection, because this alone won't do too much.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective. Snug but not to tight of a fit. I can not remove the laptop from the sleeve with one hand. Works great in my leather bag that packs padding for my laptop. I have a 14 inch Dell laptop. No zipper, seam, or material issues in about a year. For the price you can't go wrong. For the price it may be 5 stars, but without longer term testing I won't give it that.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Very Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Late last year, this case was purchased as a gift for my beloved younger sister. She absolutely loves it. And believe me if it weren't up to her standards, that chica wouldn't travel everywhere with it. Furtherto, she'd have given it back to me. The color is nice (I bought the blue), the material is smooth yet sturdy and it can hold two 17 inch laptops if I really try. I feel very comfortable in knowing that her laptop is in safe hands.
customer_reviews.author: S G Holder

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics 15.6-Inch Laptop Sleeve - Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Size:15.6 Inch| Style:1-PackAn Amazon Brand.
feature_bullets: Form-fitting sleeve with quick top-loading access
Precise fit for laptops and ultrabooks with a 15.6 inch display
Slim design allows you to carry the case by itself or in a bag
Form-fitting neoprene construction protects your Device
Slim design allows you to carry the case by itself or in a bag
Protect your laptop from bumps and scratches
Precise fit for laptops and ultrabooks with a 15.6-Inch display

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars45,975 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
